title: Guest Account (com.apple.MCX)
description: The payload that configures guest accounts.

EnableGuestAccount.title: Enable Guest Account
EnableGuestAccount.description: If 'true', the system enables the guest account.

DisableGuestAccount.title: Disable Guest Account
DisableGuestAccount.description: If 'true', the system disables the guest account. This property has no effect if 'EnableGuestAccount' is 'true'.
